item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

I just found out there is a Taiwanese Restaurant in Nashua that has Dim Sum on the weekends. I would like to check out their Dim Sum and hope you can join me.

About the Restaurant:

Formosa Taipei restaurant specializes in the authentic Chinese Taipei as well as the well-known Chinese cuisine. At Formosa Taipei restaurant they strive to serve the customers with the most delicious food while not to compromise the healthiness.

The food they serve that you will love and enjoy because they only use the highest quality and the freshest ingredients in the kitchen. They feel obligated and proud in every dish we serve. The menu offers some of the most authentic Taipei street style food made freshly by the famous chefs Mr. & Mrs. Lee whom known as “Ah-Ma” in the very popular restaurant they used to own in MA.

Review:
http://www.encorebuzz...

Menu:

http://www.formosa-ta...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Dim Sum @ Formosa Taipei II
